item.label:
The MEMSAP Excavation Module was prepared in 2014 for Dr Jessica Thompson, University of Queensland. It is an adaption of the standard FAIMS Excavation Module, and allows for the single context recording of deposits, which can be grouped into Geological Units.
For more information, see the MEMSAP Excavation Module Guide. It provides an overview of the features and navigation of the Module.
Definitions and vocabulary lists for each Attribute are accessible via the Help button alongside each attribute.
{Context}s not yet reviewed by Trench Supervisor

select1.label: Tap {Context} ID in list below to load it.
Tap {Context_Group} in list below to load it.

input.label: Here you can enter relationships between contexts, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Context from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Contexts’.

trigger.label: Load Selected {Context} and Exit this Context

item.label: Here you can group contexts into a single {Context_Group}.
You can add this Context to already existing {Context_Group}.
Here are the {Context_Group}s that this Context belongs to.
Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for Context photos or associated images stored on another device.

select1.label: >Click to select a {Context} to add to the {Context_Group}:

item.label: Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.
